accessibility_standards.wcag_compliance: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for all UI elements
accessibility_standards.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44pt touch targets for all interactive elements
accessibility_standards.color_contrast: 4.5:1 minimum contrast ratio for all text

privacy_standards.data_handling: All financial data remains local by default
privacy_standards.user_consent: Clear consent for optional cloud backup features
privacy_standards.transparency: Open source privacy policy with technical implementation details

testing_requirements.code_coverage: Minimum 80% test coverage for critical financial logic
testing_requirements.device_testing: Testing across iPhone 12+, Android API 28+, various screen sizes
testing_requirements.security_testing: Penetration testing for data encryption and local storage security
testing_requirements.performance_testing: Load testing with 10,000+ transactions per user scenario

iteration_cycles: Alpha: Core functionality testing with internal team
Beta: Limited user testing with privacy-conscious early adopters
Release Candidate: Performance optimization and polish
Production: Gradual rollout with monitoring and feedback collection
